summary:
Diana ECE and RACEMENU preset.
Update september 2017 : Diana grew up...a little bit.
Update may 2016 : New variation of DIANA. DIANA 2016!!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][center][size=4][b][color=#6aa84f]Diana 2017 "Platinum Version" is available (ECE and Racemenu)[/color][/b][/size][/center]
--------------------------Quality Follower  "Diana Vampire Version" available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77214/?]HERE[/url]  by [/size][size=4][size=3]Ashes2Asherz ------[/size][size=3]----------------
--------------------------My blog [color=#ff7700]Skyrim Scandal[/color] (UUNP showcase/ ENB test/tips/ Retex) [url=https://skyrimscandal.blogspot.com/]HERE[/url] ----------------
-----------------------------------------------------------My flickr [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/140099146@N03/]HERE[/url] ---------------------------------------------------------
[/size][u][b][img width=950,height=534]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71844-0-1505594481.jpg[/img]
[/b][/u][/size][/font][center][color=#00ff00][size=5]
 Diana 2017 "Platinum Version" ECE and Racemenu
[font=Georgia][i]- Beauty is a weapon -[/i][/font]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71844-0-1505548906.gif[/img][/size][/color][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][u][b][color=#ff00ff][size=5]Description:[/size][/color][/b][/u][/size][/font]

[size=4]This is an ECE or RACEMENU save of one of my favorite characters. Her name is Diana, and she is a Nord. I worked on her face week after week, month after month, and now it's time to share. I really hope you will have great adventures with her.
All my creations are made with ECE (Enhanced Character Edit), then converted to Racemenu, so Diana is available for all users :)

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Update [/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=5]Septembre 2017[/size][/color] [color=#ff0000][size=5]: The new preset of Diana is available : Diana 2017 "Platinum Edition"[/size][/color]
A new version. Yes of course, Diana grew up.
- The Racemenu preset is NMM ready
- Now Diana has new brows -[/size][size=4] Maevan2's eye brows[color=#ff0000][size=5][color=#ffffff][size=4]. They are beautiful and available on Nexus[/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=4].
- Complete remesh of the head. That was necessary to make it fit with Maevan2's eye brows.
- New haircut
- New complexion: small freckles from Fairskin complexion
- Always Ashen hair color :)
- The conversion for ECE to Racemenu has been made by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/28059195/?]Triptherift[/url]
- Always cute eyes
[/size][/color]
Update  May  2016 : Another variation of Diana is available. DIANA 2016 !!! [/size][/color]
This version is just another vision of her. She is still the same of course.
DIANA 2016 changes :
- New tint
- Perfect eyelash
- Ashen hair
- New hair color/ haircut
- New eyes color
- Thinner face
- Always feminine and natural beauty

[img width=1037,height=583]https://c4.staticflickr.com/6/5490/29507029683_db3bf83443_h.jpg[/img][/size]




[color=#ff00ff][size=5][u][b][font=Comic Sans MS]How to install: [size=3]( Install this preset manually. Do not use NMM or MO/ except for the Racemenu 2017 version NMM ready)[/size][/font][/b][/u][/size][/color]

[size=4]Before loading the preset, i recommand you to select the[u] Female Nord Race[/u].


- If you use [color=#00ff00]Enhanced Character Edit[/color]:

Download only "Diana ECE preset" or "Diana 2016 ECE preset" or "Diana 2017 ECE preset platinum edition"
Extract the file in myDocuments/My Games/Skyrim/CME_save
In the game, enter racemenu (console command " showracemenu ")
Search for the slider "slot load" and load "slot 3" for Diana 2015
        !! Slot 10 for DIANA 2016 !!
        !! Slot 37 for DIANA 2017 !!
Diana appears like magic!!


- If you use [color=#00ff00]Racemenu[/color]:

Download only "Diana Racemenu preset " or "Diana 2016 racemenu preset" or "Diana 2017 racemenu preset Platinum Edition"
Extract the file in data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets
Go into showracemenu, and select the preset tab
Select the preset called "Diana.jslot" and hit enter.
[font=Trebuchet MS] [/font]Diana appears like magic!!

You can use the Nif file too. Just put the nif in the Chargen folder, then in racemenu, import the nif using the sculpt tab. Be sure to mask off her neck if you intend to change her weight.

[/size]

[color=#ff00ff][size=5][u][b][font=Comic Sans MS]REQUIREMENT MODS LIST:[/font][/b][/u][/size][/color]

[size=4]If you want exactly the same result like me, you need this list of mods.
You can use different eyes textures, mouth textures or face textures but you will not have the same result.

Enhanced Character Edit 1.4 (for ECE users) :         [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]The face creation[/url]

                                                   [color=#ff0000] or[/color]
Racemenu (for Racemenu users) :                           [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]The Face creation
[/url]
                          ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------       
                
- Fair skin complexion  7.9.1 or newest :                 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Textures for the face, body, tint, lips, eyelash, teeth[/url]

- Maevan2's brows   (Diana 2017):                            [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72825/?]Maevan2's brows        (Diana 2017)
[/url]  [i]"Install the Pure Black version"[/i]. With the pure black version, Diana will have black brows and not ashen brows like her hair.

- True brows 1.7 (Diana 2015 and 2016)                   True Brows is not available anymore. So, for 2015 and 2016 presets, just use brows you like.           [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]
[/url]
- KS Hairdos for "Diana preset 2015 and 2017" :        [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]Her hair (version 2015 and 2017)
[/url]
- SG hair pack 268 by hello santa :                           Her hair (version 2016)  Not on Nexus, google it!

- Cute eyes 1.2 :                                                     [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13076/?]Her eyes
[/url](note : I received a question about "cute eyes" and why i recommend it. "Cute eyes" has a unique cubemap (texture) which gives a unique look. This is the reason of my recommendation.)
[/size]
[img width=1024,height=576]https://c4.staticflickr.com/6/5689/30034609123_4d21381195_k.jpg[/img]

[color=#ff00ff][size=5][u][b][font=Comic Sans MS]Recommended mods:[/font][/b][/u][/size][/color]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff00ff]
[/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff00ff]
[/color][/font][u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00][size=4]Female facial animation:[/size][/color][/font][/u][size=4][u]
[/u]
I recommend Female facial animation. This file improves the expression of female characters, and the motion of the mouth.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]FEMALE FACIAL ANIMATION
[/url]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff00ff]
[/color][/font][u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00]Facial expression project[/color][/font][color=#ffff00]:[/color][/u]

Stop using the console command for expression! Use the weapon...
I recommend Facial expression project . This mod gives " humanity" to your character.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60261/? (hidden file...follow the link..)
[u][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ffff00]
Facelight and facelight plus:[/color][/font][/u]

I recommend facelight          http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?

I recommend facelightplus    http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71063/?

This mod adds a lighting spell called "Facelight" to your character face or for an NPC.
[/size]

[color=#ff00ff][size=5][u][b][font=Comic Sans MS]About the body:[/font][/b][/u][/size][/color]

[size=4]You can use the body shape you want. I have tried both UNP or CBBE. Both work well.

The best bodies for Diana are CBBE slim or UNPetite, as her face fits well with these bodies. However, you are free to use what you want :) But Diana has a preference for the UUNP familly :)
[img width=985,height=554]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71844-3-1505594480.jpg[/img]

[img width=987,height=555]https://c7.staticflickr.com/8/7537/29507565494_7add5f8891_h.jpg[/img]
[/size]
[color=#ff00ff][size=4][u][b][font=Comic Sans MS] [center] About me:[/center][/font][/b][/u][/size][/color]

 [img width=297,height=527]https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8269/29870174632_1537148c89_k.jpg[/img][img width=297,height=528]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/71844/71844-1526984095-1679168518.jpeg[/img][img width=297,height=528]https://c6.staticflickr.com/6/5653/30580463661_3a2fd63a2e_k.jpg[/img][right]﻿[/right]                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]I hope you will like my creation.

Diana is perfect with all ENB...even in vanilla....... lol......but honestly, I haven't tried ALL enbs, but I can assure you that the result is perfect with the majority of ENBS.

I am not a modder., I am a user of mods. I can't help about modding or technical issues.

If you have questions, I will try to give you the best answers I can :)

English is not my native language....but I will try to do my best :)

Do not hesitate to upload your images/results of Diana. I like (a lot) to watch your own interpretation of her.
[/size][/font]
